topic.title: What you can do for other languages

body.p: If you need to translate from a language that is not included in the list of currently supported languages, contact your local IBM representative and ask about the availability of new language-support files.

The list of target languages includes all languages for which language-support files exist, and certain other languages that are supported by Windows. If you want to translate into other languages, select Other Languages from the list of languages.
